caption.body: "When invited to exhibit at the inaugural "Elements" silver show in Edinburgh…my memories of the Periodic Table hung in my science classroom…sparked the idea to use them as the basis for my piece, executed with a mixture of precision and freedom that I hope characterizes all my work." - Karen Wallace (b. 1984)  Tumbler cup  2015 Edinburgh Britannia silver, parcel-gilt The Pearson Silver Collection L2018.1801.034  Special thanks to The Pearson Silver Collection. "A Sterling Renaissance: British Silver Design 1957 to 2018" is on display, pre-security, in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/BritishSilver
